name: Black Screen Simulator 2017
description:
Are you Ready to Wake up?

Black Screen Simulator 2017 can best be described as an experimental project.

While on the surface level seeming like another “Meme game” it is more an experiment in subverting the sub genre that has become synonymous with the current state of greenlight era games.

To this end it combines elements of mystery and puzzle games along with a few other genres.

But not to give too much of the game away I do hope you will give it a download and solve it for yourself.

Thanks so much to the support of the folks over at my patreon if you want to help keep me making games consider donating to this game or supporting me long term over there.

Patreon.com/dustyofpodunk

Podunk Passerby

Jessy Michelle

Elvish Nerding

Podunk Person of Interest

Pixel Girl Plays

I want to give special thanks to Aravelle, Sulyspa, Desktopsimmer and ShadowStalker who gave the orginal joke that inspired this game.

Most of all I want to thank

Woody and Foxy for being the furry queens in my life

Biggest Thanks of All to

Emma – for being the candle in the dark and putting up with my nonsense
